What is the difference between inline and block elements in CSS?
answer_1: Inline is displayed horizontally, block is displayed vertically
answer_2: Inline is displayed vertically, block is displayed horizontally
answer_3: Inline is displayed in a box, block is displayed in a row
right_answer: Inline is displayed in a box, block is displayed in a row
